topics.body:
Today, I finally saved up enough money to buy a Wii U, and as I was headed from the bank to the Wal-Mart where I was gonna buy it, I lost my wallet. And my wallet had everything in it- my bank card, my driver's license, my fucking _Social Security Card, goddamn everything_. So instead of playing on a brand-new Wii U, I get to spend the next few days wrangling with my state and federal governments to get replacements for all those, while simultaneously hoping someone doesn't try to use my personal information to go on a crime spree.

Yay me.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

Wow. That's really sh*tty luck.

Good luck to you.
